Aji Santoso Ingin Tumbuhkan Kompetisi Antar Pemain Persebaya
02 Nov 2019, 09:57 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Persebaya, Aji Santoso akan memberlakukan rotasi pemain dalam tubuh Green Force. Dia ingin menumbuhkan kompetisi antar pemain agar persaingan dalam tim berjalan dengan baik.
Hal itu diungkapkan Aji Santoso usai memimpin latihan di Lapangan Mapolda Jawa Timur, Sabtu (2/11/2019) pagi.
Itu artinya, tidak ada pemain yang akan mendapat garansi untuk selalu menjadi pilihan utama di setiap pertandingan. Mereka harus menunjukkan kemampuannya di dalam latihan.
"Saya megang tim juga selalu saya pergunakan dengan sistem rotasi, karena tidak mungkin dalam satu pertandingan pemain itu terus main," kata Aji Santoso usai latihan, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
"Saya juga tidak mau pemain yang lain hanya menemani latihan pemain inti. Jadi saya tumbuhkan kompetisi di antara pemain supaya sehat," sambungnya.

Aji Santoso Wants to Grow Competition between Persebaya Players
02 Nov 2019, 09:57 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya coach Aji Santoso will impose player rotation on the Green Force. He wants to foster competition between players so that competition in the team goes well.
This was revealed by Aji Santoso after leading the training at the East Java Regional Police Headquarters on Saturday (11/02/2019) morning.
That means, no player will get a guarantee to always be the first choice in every match. They must demonstrate their abilities in training.
"I also hold the team I always use with the rotation system, because it is not possible in one match that players continue to play," said Aji Santoso after training, Saturday (11/02/2019).
"I also do not want other players to just accompany the training of core players. So I foster competition between players to be healthy," he continued.
